sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO cstudio_deploymentsynchistory (syncdate, site, environment, path, target, username, contenttypeclass) values (#syncDate#, #site#, #environment#, #path#, #target#, #user#, #contentTypeClass#)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT dsh1.* FROM cstudio_deploymentsynchistory as dsh1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT dsh2.site, dsh2.path, dsh2.target, MAX(dsh2.syncdate) as syncdate FROM cstudio_deploymentsynchistory as dsh2 WHERE dsh2.site = #site# AND dsh2.syncdate BETWEEN #from_date# AND #to_date# GROUP BY dsh2.site, dsh2.path, dsh2.target, DATE(dsh2.syncdate)) as dsh3 ON dsh1.path = dsh3.path and dsh1.target = dsh3.target and dsh1.syncdate = dsh3.syncdate WHERE dsh1.site = #site#
dsh1.contenttypeclass=#filter#
ORDER BY dsh1.syncdate desc LIMIT #limit#
SELECT * FROM cstudio_copytoenvironment WHERE site = #site# AND state = #state# AND scheduleddate > #now# ORDER BY scheduleddate ASC
